subsection.name: Operating Systems
subsection.p: The Hippo ECM software is able to run on at least the following Operating Systems:

ul.li: Linux, RedHat (RHEL), SUSE (SLES), Debian, Ubuntu and other distributions

subsection.p: It should be possible to run the software on any POSIX compliant Operating System.

subsection.p: Hippo ECM requires an application container. One of the following can be used:

ul.li: Sun ONE Application Server and Sun Glassfish V2
